skills.name: Holy Verdict
skills.description: When Basic or Burst attacks hit the enemy, summon Orbital Support to deal 450% ATK of Physical DMG to target nearby enemies. Orbital Support can strike once every 6.0s. Sündenjäger equip bonus: Apply a Hunted Brand to current target for 13s.

skills.name: Blooded Hands
skills.description: Every time the character summons Orbital Support using the Holy Verdict skill, character gains 7% Physical DMG for 20.0s. Stacks up to 6 times. Triggering this again resets the duration. Buff ends once the character exits.
